name: You Are: Demo
description:
You Are : Demo is a short demo about being defined by your actions. Explore a world that sees you differently based on your actions. 

If you like what you played and would like to see more of this game or have any feedback at all, do reach out! 

Twitter: @_zhimingchen

Magic Scout - Cottages Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Thanks for playing!
